question:
To power off your iPhone,

Choices:
A: press and hold the button on the right side of the phone for 3 seconds, then move the slider on the screen to the right.
B: press and hold the buttons on the left side of the phone for 3 seconds, then move the slider on the screen to the right.
steps: Identify what the question is asking: how to power off an iPhone.
Review the choices given for performing the action.
Recall the standard method for powering off an iPhone.
Recognize that the side button on the right side of iPhones (or top for older models) is used to initiate the power off process.
Verify that pressing and holding this button for a few seconds brings up the power off slider on the screen.
Understand that moving the slider to the right confirms the power off operation.
Confirm that the description in choice A matches the standard method to power off an iPhone.
Note that choice B references buttons on the left side, which are typically for volume control and not for powering off the device.
Conclude that choice A is the correct procedure, given the correct button and action are described.
